sentence.Network_en: I need a man , a man who can unquestioningly follow orders.
sentence.Network_cn: 我要个帮手, 一个无条件遵守命令的人.
他忠实地追随着他的领导.

PerfectNetExp.abs: I had lived on dogma and dicta which I had accepted unquestioningly through the years , even though I believed little of , because I feared to question .多年来即使不相信，我还是毫不质疑地接受教条与格言为生活的准则，因为我不敢质疑。

entry.tran: 毫不怀疑的；毫不犹豫的
entry.def: If you describe a person or their beliefs as unquestioning, you are emphasizing that they accept something without any doubt or disagreement.

example.ex: Isabella had been taught unquestioning obedience...
example.tran: 伊莎贝拉被要求无条件服从。

example.ex: For the last 20 years, I have been an unquestioning supporter of comprehensive schools.
example.tran: 在过去的20年中，我一直都是综合性学校的坚决支持者。

auth_sentence.content: The Sunday Leader has never sought safety by unquestioningly articulating the majority view.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Sunday Leader has never sought safety by unquestioningly articulating the majority view.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Sunday Leader has never sought safety by unquestioningly articulating the majority view.

auth_sentence.content: So much of what you believe is what you've been told to believe unquestioningly.
auth_sentence.res_content: So much of what you believe is what you've been told to believe unquestioningly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So much of what you believe is what you've been told to believe unquestioningly.

auth_sentence.content: But very much boiler plate; the kinds of things that Hu Jintao said in his speeches were repeated unquestioningly in the media.
auth_sentence.res_content: But very much boiler plate; the kinds of things that Hu Jintao said in his speeches were repeated unquestioningly in the media.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But very much boiler plate; the kinds of things that Hu Jintao said in his speeches were repeated unquestioningly in the media.
